import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const LandingPage: React.FC = () => { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => setLoading(false), 2000); return () => clearTimeout(timer); }, []); if (loading) { return (
